hero.headline: Transforming Member Experience for Texas's Largest Credit Union
hero.subtitle: For over five years, we've partnered with TDECU on deep operational insights, bottleneck identification, go-to-market strategic planning, and executive decision support—research-driven transformation for 350,000+ credit union members.

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.intro: One of Texas's largest credit unions, serving over 350,000 members, faced a critical inflection point. Member expectations had shifted toward digital-first experiences, but the organization's digital ecosystem had evolved organically, creating fragmented experiences that didn't reflect their commitment to service excellence.

cards.title: Operational Bottlenecks
cards.description: Years of organic growth had created friction points across digital and physical channels. Long click paths and fragmented workflows were slowing member journeys and increasing support costs.

cards.title: Strategic Decision Gaps
cards.description: Executive leadership needed data-driven insights to guide go-to-market strategy, brand positioning, and digital investment decisions—not just opinions and assumptions.

cards.title: Untapped Member Intelligence
cards.description: Despite serving 350,000+ members, TDECU lacked systematic research programs to uncover bottlenecks, validate brand positioning, and inform strategic planning at the highest levels.

approach.heading: Our Approach
approach.intro: We built a comprehensive research program that gave TDECU unprecedented visibility into member needs, then translated those insights into strategic action.

steps.title: Click Path Optimization
steps.description: Systematic analysis of member journeys to identify and eliminate friction. Reduced click paths by 40% across critical workflows.

steps.title: Bottleneck Identification
steps.description: Deep operational insights revealing where member journeys break down. Data-driven recommendations that remove friction points.

steps.title: Brand Validation Testing
steps.description: Large-scale market research validating brand positioning with target demographics. Ensuring TDECU's brand promise resonates with members.

steps.title: Executive Decision Support
steps.description: Research presentations to the highest levels of leadership. Go-to-market strategic planning informed by member insights.

work.heading: The Work
work.intro: Our embedded partnership with TDECU spans strategic research, digital transformation, and ongoing operational optimization.

cards.title: Website Strategy
cards.description: Aligning digital presence with brand promise. Creating a website experience that reflects TDECU's member-first values while enabling efficient self-service.

cards.title: Channel Optimization
cards.description: Data-driven improvements based on member behavior insights. Understanding how members prefer to interact, and designing experiences that meet them where they are.

cards.title: Member Research
cards.description: Systematic research programs uncovering member needs, validating positioning, and informing strategic planning at executive level.

cards.title: Brand Validation
cards.description: Large-scale market testing ensuring TDECU's brand positioning resonates with current and prospective members across demographics.

cards.title: Journey Optimization
cards.description: Reducing click paths, eliminating bottlenecks, and streamlining critical workflows like account opening and loan applications.

cards.title: Ongoing Partnership
cards.description: Embedded team model providing continuous UX support and strategic guidance across digital transformation initiatives.

results.heading: Results
results.intro: Deep operational insights, bottleneck removal, and executive decision support have transformed how TDECU understands and serves its members.

metrics.label: Reduced Click Paths
metrics.description: Significant streamlining of critical member journeys across digital channels.

metrics.label: Years of Strategic Partnership
metrics.description: Sustained engagement delivering continuous value and strategic insights.

metrics.label: Executive Decision Support
metrics.description: Regular research presentations and strategic planning sessions with top leadership.

metrics.label: Members Impacted
metrics.description: Improvements benefiting entire member base across all digital and physical channels.
